thread.title: With Howard back in goal, US loses to Costa Rica 1-0
thread.title_full: With Howard back in goal, US loses to Costa Rica 1-0

title: With Howard back in goal, US loses to Costa Rica 1-0
text:
> Top News With Howard back in goal, US loses to Costa Rica 1-0 Costa Rica's Joel Campbell, right, scores a goal on United States goalkeeper Tim Howard, center, as defender Brad Evans, left, tries to help defend during the second half of a international soccer friendly match, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, in Harrison, N.J. (AP Photo/Julio Cortez)
